full_threads.body:
HI Chis,

Thanks for that.

Just a couple of things.

￼￼￼￼￼￼

>>

If you could use the video in the top left corner as the background video please. "Media & Presentation Training <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e17wh1YtITE>”

>>
>>

>>
>>

￼


Thank You.

Darren Robinson
0417445075
https://shellshockedmedia.com

￼

Hi Darren,

Jumping in on behalf of Heath. Great news, your requested updates have been completed. Please let me know if there are any further tweaks.

@jaime just for future reference, the reason why you couldn't load the vimeo links is because the client has them set to only load on their domain. So once you copy and paste them to the website, they work. Next time,  you can drop them in to see if they are correct. Hope this helps.
Hi @chris done, looks good on my end

hi @jaime for reason, the menu has disappeared, can you please investigate?
Could it simply be white font?

@ricaV2 + 2hrs please.

Hi Darren, 

We have made the below updates for you. The only one outstanding is the holding jpg for th resilience header. Can you please send through a higher resolution version of that for me?

Hi mate, Thanks for that.

On the 'Home Page' can we keep the holding jpg and change the updated link https://vimeo.com/693373469 for the video?


Is it possible to change the following please.

When the site takes up the entire comp screen, the thumbnail in the centre, Shell'y face disappears, can we centre her face like the other 2 thumbnails please.


When the site takes up the smallest comp screen space, the thumbnail in the centre and on the right change shape. can we keep all thumbnails square?


In The Courses tab, on the 'Who Is This For' page we get the following stripe thumbnail can we add this holding jpg?


Same thing happens on the '1Hr Making Virtual Meetings Work' page

In the Services tab, on the' Video Production' page can we change the ratio of the video to match the aspect ratio of the Home Page, so it not cropped please? Also as you scroll down, can we remove the Photos behind the thumbnails as the first lot are from live events and the second lot are from TV and replace with the uncropped header video please.

In the Online Content tab, on the'TYCTAOTV' page can we change the ratio of the video to match the aspect ratio of the News & Opinion Page, so it not cropped please?

Thanks.

We have made those changes and flushed the cache, so you should be fine now.

HI Mate and thanks.
